article.title: Lockheed Awarded Nuclear Weapon Security System Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Space Systems Company, Sunnyvale, California, is being awarded a potential $37,612,863 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to provide for the procurement of security hardware, associated software, equipment installation, system test, accreditation, certification and delivery of Nuclear Weapon Security (NWS) system equipment at Navy Installations.Â The Navy's Strategic Systems Programs, Washington, DC, is the contracting activity.
